Description:
Detects the creation of a suspicious ADS (Alternate Data Stream) file by software other than browsers

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Creation Of a Suspicious ADS File Outside a Browser Download
Query: sourcetype="windows-*" (contents="[ZoneTransfer]  ZoneId=3*" filepath="*:Zone.Identifier" (filepath="*.exe*" OR filepath="*.scr*" OR filepath="*.bat*" OR filepath="*.cmd*" OR filepath="*.docx*" OR filepath="*.hta*" OR filepath="*.jse*" OR filepath="*.lnk*" OR filepath="*.pptx*" OR filepath="*.ps*" OR filepath="*.reg*" OR filepath="*.sct*" OR filepath="*.vb*" OR filepath="*.wsc*" OR filepath="*.wsf*" OR filepath="*.xlsx*")) NOT (process_path="*\\whale.exe" OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe") OR process_path="*\\maxthon.exe" OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeWebView\\Application\\*" process_path="*\\WindowsApps\\MicrosoftEdge.exe" (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\Edge\\Application\\msedge.exe")) OR process_path="*\\opera.exe" OR process_path="*\\vivaldi.exe" OR process_path="*\\seamonkey.exe" OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Mozilla Firefox\\firefox.exe") OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Internet Explorer\\iexplore.exe") OR process_path="*\\safari.exe" OR process_path="*\\brave.exe" OR ((process_path="C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*" OR process_path="C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft\\EdgeCore\\*") (process_path="*\\msedge.exe" OR process_path="*\\msedgewebview2.exe")) OR (process_path="C:\\Program Files\\WindowsApps\\Microsoft.ScreenSketch_*" process_path="*\\SnippingTool\\SnippingTool.exe" filepath="C:\\Users\\*" (filepath="*\\AppData\\Local\\Packages\\Microsoft.ScreenSketch_*" filepath="*\\TempState\\Screenshot *") filepath="*.png:Zone.Identifier"))
